text: I have a global email module that takes HTML from a contacts table field and changes some of the HTML using HubL replace filters. It works as expected when I preview the output in the Design Previewer. It reverts to the original HTML when I test it with a live email. The email is sent through a workflow. Does anyone know why that might be happening?
Yes, plus button and search :mag:  for them

Hi community! 
Is there a class that HubSpot uses on email builder for hiding elements on mobile? That I can add to certain things that I dont want to show on mobile and viceversa?
